hanzi-su-wiki:
語

Значения

Говорить, рассказывать; разговаривать; язык, речь

Мнемоника

  • Слова 言, используемые в кругу семьи 吾.

  • "Они разговаривают 言口 на пяти 五 языках."

Варианты

语

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 语)
Pictophonetic: 吾 indicates the sound; 言 (words) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 語言 [ yǔ yán ]: language; Classifiers: 门
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 吾 [ wú ] I, my, our; to resist, to impede
heisig_chinese_memo: The simplest word to say in any language is I (me).
heisig_constituent: word, say, words, keitai, mouth, I, five, mouth, mouth2
heisig_story: Whereas the character for say focused on the actual talking, that for words stresses the fact that although it is I who say them, the words of a language are not my own. You can see the clear distinction between I and words just by looking at the kanji.
koohiiStory1: The simplest word to say is I.
koohiiStory2: May I say a word about that?
jp_example_words:
漢語(かんご): Chinese word, Sino-Japanese word
語彙(ごい): vocabulary, glossary
語句(ごく): words, phrases
語源(ごげん): word root, word derivation, etymology
標語(ひょうご): motto, slogan, catchword
文語(ぶんご): written language, literary language
略語(りゃくご): abbreviation, acronym
語る(かたる): talk, tell, recite
敬語(けいご): honorific, term of respect
言語(げんご): language
語(ご): language, word
語学(ごがく): language study
国語(こくご): national language
熟語(じゅくご): idiom, idiomatic phrase, kanji compound
主語(しゅご): (grammar) subject
述語(じゅつご): predicate
単語(たんご): word, vocabulary, (usually) single-character word
物語(ものがたり): tale, story, legend
物語る(ものがたる): tell, indicate
用語(ようご): term, terminology
英語(えいご): the English language
jp_readingExamples: 語らう (かた.らう), 語る (かた.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: What you say between five mouths is a language. As long as there are five different people saying these same words with their five mouths, it's considered its own language.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture these five mouths saying the same language to each other. They can understand each other! The mouths are smiling and laughing too.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Another mouth joins in speaking the language, but it's green and scaled and... it's Godzilla's (ご) mouth! Godzilla speaks this language too.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Godzilla speaks a language some people understand! You wish you knew this earlier, then you might have been able to stop some of his destruction. Try to say, "Hey Godzilla, please stop destroying my city," in his language. It's a lot of growling and yelling. He doesn't seem to understand you. You better practice your pronunciation.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 口 (рот), 五 (пять), 言 (слово)
Ru_trainchinese:
yǔ: (графема) язык; знак, сигнал (как средство коммуникации); изречение, поговорка; слово, фраза; (о птицах) щебетание, (о насекомых) стрекотание
yù: (графема) (книжн.) говорить, сообщать
yǔ: (графема) разговаривать, выражаться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the words (言) of the five (五) mouths (口) = talking
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: If you have at least five mouths that can say the same words then you have a language.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions express discourse and speech. Zhongshan Wangding: "Wu (噖)虖 (覗)﹗The language is not waste Zai!" and "敔" means defending the imperial court. Yu Yizhong: "Sun and grandchildren use it. (敔)" (see Guo Moruo).

"Shuowen": "Language, discussion. From words to voices."
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from " word ", " I " voice, " I " or the " mouth ", from only two " five " shape, the ancient " five ", " I ", " language " is a homonym, so " five "" and " I " are all sound symbols of " Yu ". The original meaning is speech.
humanum_full_description:
金文表示話語、言論，中山王鼎：「烏(嗚)虖(呼)﹗語不廢哉﹗」又通「敔」，表示捍禦，余義鐘：「孫孫用之，後民是語(敔)」(參郭沫若)。

　　《說文》：「語，論也。从言吾聲。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「言」，「吾」聲，「吾」或不從「口」，只從兩個「五」形，上古「五」、「吾」、「語」同音，故「五」、「吾」皆是「語」的聲符。本義是言語。

語字的基本解释

語
yǔ

語
yù
均见“语”。

語字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǔ］
［《廣韻》魚巨切，上語，疑。］
“语1”的繁体字。
(1)谈话；谈论。
(2)话；语言。
(3)字；文句。
(4)指语音。
(5)俗话、谚语或古书中的话。
(6)即语体。
(7)用以示意的动作或信号。
(8)喻指虫豸禽兽等啼鸣吼叫。
(9)指琴弦之声。
(10)语法学用以表以表示词组。
(11)用作表示句子成分的术语。
(12)《论语》的省称。
[②]［yù］
［《廣韻》午倨切，去御，疑。］
“语2”的繁体字。
(1)告诉。
(2)通“悟”。

語字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　語； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1163第08
【唐韻】魚舉切【集韻】偶舉切【韻會】魚許切【正韻】偶許切，?魚上聲。【說文】論也。【徐曰】論難曰語。語者，午也。言交午也。吾言爲語，吾，語辭也。言者直言，語者相應答。【釋名】敘也。敘己所欲說也。【易·頤卦】君子以愼言語，節飮食。【詩·大雅】于時言言，于時語語。【疏】直言曰言，謂一人自言。答難曰語，謂二人相對。【禮·雜記】三年之喪，言而不語。【註】言，自言己事也。語，爲人論說也。【家語】孔子之郯，遭程子于塗，傾蓋而語終日。　又國名。【別國洞冥記】勒畢國人長三寸，有翼，善言語戲笑，因名善語國。　又【廣韻】牛倨切【集韻】牛據切【韻會】【正韻】魚據切，?魚去聲。【廣韻】告也。【增韻】以言告人也。【左傳·隱元年】公語之故。【論語】居，吾語女。　又敎戒也。【魯語】主亦有以語肥也。　又地名。【前漢·閩粵王傳】錢唐榬終古斬徇北將軍爲語兒侯。【孟康註】語兒，越中地也。今吳南亭是。【師古曰】語，或作篽、籞。

language
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [yǔ]
["Guangyun" fish giant cut, upper language, suspicious. ]
Traditional characters of "语1".
(1) Talk; talk.
(2) Words; language.
(3) Words; sentences.
(4) Refers to speech.
(5) Sayings, proverbs or words in ancient books.
(6) Namely style.
(7) Actions or signals used to indicate.
(8) Yu refers to the crying and roaring of insects, beasts and animals.
(9) Refers to the sound of strings.
(10) Grammar is used to represent phrases.
(11) Used as a term to express the components of a sentence.
(12) The provincial title of "The Analects".
[②]［yù］
["Guangyun" cuts at noon, goes to imperial, suspicious. ]
Traditional characters of "语2".
(1) Tell.
(2) Through "enlightenment".
language
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【You Ji 1】【Words Department】　Yu; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: Page 1163 to 08
[Tang Yun] Fish Lifting and Cutting [Jiyun] Evening Lifting and Cutting [Rhyme Meeting] Yu Xu Cutting [Zheng Yun] Even Xu cutting,? Fish on sound. [Said Wen] Discuss also. [Xu Yue] Talking about the difficulty of speaking. Whisperer, noon too. Talk to each other at noon. My words are words, my words are also words. The speaker speaks bluntly, and the speaker responds. [Release name] Xu Ye. Say what you want. [Easy·Yi Gua] Gentlemen use stunned words and eat feasts. 【Poetry·Daya】Speaking at the time, saying at the time. 【Sparse】Speaking bluntly means saying that one person speaks to himself. The answer is in words, saying that the two are facing each other. 【Rite·Miscellaneous】Three years of funeral, without words. 【Note】Speaking, telling yourself what you are doing. Language, speak for others. [Family language] Confucius’ Tan, was painted by Cheng Zi, and talked all day long.　 Also the name of the country. [Beigudong Mingji] The people of Lebi are three inches long, have wings, and are good at talking and laughing, because of the name of the country.　[Guang Yun] Niu Di cut [Ji Yun] Niu Ju Qi [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Fish Die cut, fish go sound. [Guang Yun] Tell me too. [Zeng Yun] Tell people with words. [Zuo Zhuan·Yin Year] Because of the official language. [The Analects] Ju, my language female.　Also again. [Lu language] The main language is also fat.　Also place name. [Previous Han·Fujian Wang Biography] Qian Tangju was a linger in the north of the generals. [Mengkang's Note] Yuer, Yuezhong. Wu Nanting is today. 【Shigu Yue】Speaking, or making bamboo and bamboo.

yǔ, yù
вм. 语

語

Значения

Говорить, рассказывать; разговаривать; язык, речь

Мнемоника

  • Слова 言, используемые в кругу семьи 吾.

  • "Они разговаривают 言口 на пяти 五 языках."

Варианты

语

Radicals: 言, 五, 口  (say, five, mouth)
Meaning Mnemonic
What you say between five mouths is a language. As long as there are five different people saying these same words with their five mouths, it's considered its own language.
Picture these five mouths saying the same language to each other. They can understand each other! The mouths are smiling and laughing too.
Reading Mnemonic
Another mouth joins in speaking the language, but it's green and scaled and... it's Godzilla's (ご) mouth! Godzilla speaks this language too.
Godzilla speaks a language some people understand! You wish you knew this earlier, then you might have been able to stop some of his destruction. Try to say, "Hey Godzilla, please stop destroying my city," in his language. It's a lot of growling and yelling. He doesn't seem to understand you. You better practice your pronunciation.
